# Module: tf.contrib.sparsemax



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/sparsemax/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.11/tensorflow/contrib/sparsemax/__init__.py).

Module that implements sparsemax and sparsemax loss, see [1].

[1]: https://arxiv.org/abs/1602.02068

## Sparsemax


## Functions

[`sparsemax(...)`](../../tf/contrib/sparsemax/sparsemax): Computes sparsemax activations [1].

[`sparsemax_loss(...)`](../../tf/contrib/sparsemax/sparsemax_loss): Computes sparsemax loss function [1].
